name: Гель для душа Palmolive Super Food Ягоды асаи и овес 250мл
ingredients: aqua, sodium laureth sulfate, cocamidopropyl betaine, sodium chloride, glycerin, parfum, cocamide mea, sodium salicylate, styrene/acrylates copolymer, sodium benzoate, polyquaternium-7, citric acid, tetrasodium edta, euterpe oleracea fruit extract, maltodextrin, avena sativa straw extract, citrus limon peel oil, lavandula angustifolia oil, limonene, linalool, ci 16035, ci 19140, ci 42090
